# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability
If you discover a security issue, please report it responsibly by emailing:

ashmitkumar1020@gmail.com

Include:
- Description of the issue
- Steps to reproduce
- Potential impact and suggested fixes (if available)

## Disclosure Policy
- Do not publicly disclose vulnerabilities until they are fixed
- We'll acknowledge and respond as quickly as possible

Thank you for helping keep the project secure.
